content.question: In context, the author’s references to her “breath” and her “smile” serve to

choices.label: imply that the apparent dissimilarities between disabled and able-bodied athletes are illusory
depict the emotional damage from a lifetime spent yearning to see herself represented in sports
admit that she felt more joy over the gymnasts’ achievements than she had over the ballerina’s
illustrate how her sense of solidarity with the gymnasts is unconstrained by physical differences

content.answer: illustrate how her sense of solidarity with the gymnasts is unconstrained by physical differences

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
